Text: For business process automation to make a difference, it begins with capturing the right #data and then using it in new and more beneficial ways. Find out how in this Everyday MBA podcast with David Jenness from IBM where we discuss in depth https://t.co/Jn5KMXZ5ES #ECM

Introducing the new IBM #LinuxONE single-frame system including IBM Secure Execution for Linux, a new offering designed to help protect from internal and external threats across the hybrid cloud. See the news: https://t.co/jUSViOxlBo
